participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time with my grandparents and hearing about their stories.
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
i believe that mermaids are real.
I'm an excellent caretaker for my pets.
I have a pet dog who is always happy to see me, no matter how bad my day was.

participant_2.background:
I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted.
i do not have a job.
i eat breakfast then go right back to bed.
I like to watch old movies from my childhood to feel like a kid again.
I enjoy movies that are full of suspense and mystery.

content.text: I love hanging out with my grandparents. They have great stories to tell.
I was adopted, so I don't know much about my grandparents.
That must be hard. Did you ever try to find out about them?
I haven't really thought about it. I don't know how I would even go about doing that.
There are a lot of resources online that can help you find your birth parents.
I'll have to look into that. Thanks for the tip.
No problem. I love hearing my grandparents stories. They're always so interesting.
What kinds of stories do they tell?
Well, they're both from the south, so they have a lot of stories about growing up there.
That sounds really cool. I'd love to hear them sometime.
Yeah, they're great storytellers. I could listen to them all day.
I'll bet. I'm sure they have a lot of wisdom to share.
Definitely. They've seen a lot in their lives.
I'm glad you have them. It sounds like they're great people to have in your life.
